full_summary:
# Open Construction Source List for CFB Edmonton

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** MX-22639806281
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WO23SLED
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-19
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2026-03-31 18:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-07-12

## Tender Description

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites contractors and suppliers to apply for the Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for various construction services required by the Department of National Defence at CFB Edmonton. The OCSL is intended to provide potential construction services for a period of three years (2023-2024, 2024-2025, and 2025-2026).

## Key Information

* The OCSL will be used for construction services with an estimated value of $10 million and below.
* Contractors and suppliers will be invited to submit bids electronically through MERX.
* Interested parties can submit a request to be placed on the OCSL at any time, but it is recommended to do so as soon as possible, preferably by January 30, 2023.
* The language selected by the applicant for this OCSL will be the only language used for tender documents, contract documents, and communication.

## Important Notes

* The OCSL may be used for procurements covered by trade agreements to which Canada is a party.
* Contractors and suppliers are advised that contracts awarded by DCC include measurable performance standards and requirements.
* All contractors and suppliers are expected to be actively engaged in meeting the business needs of DCC.

## Contact Information

For more information or to submit your application, please contact:

Justin Bennett
Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
819-962-2917

Please note that the OCSL is subject to change, and Defence Construction Canada reserves the right to alter or cancel the process at its discretion.



References:

* Defence Production Act
* Public Services and Procurement Canada's Ineligibility and Suspension Policy
* DCC's Standard Construction Contract Documents - Electronic Bidding
* Defence Construction Canada - Western Region (Contracting Entity) [www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca](http://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca) .
